name: Mad Farmer
description:
Inputs:
Movement: Mouse Input
Jump: Space
Shoot: Right mouse button

Hints:
In this game you are able to jump over fences and shoot moose with missiles. To shoot a missile it cost 50 points of your score, if you hit your target you will receive a refund of 50 points. Every dollar gives you 10 points so try and collect as many as possible. If you run into a moose or a fence you will lose a life. Beware foxes are extremely deadly and kill you instantly. Sandwiches gives you more lives.

This is an endless runner so try to set a highscore and have fun.

It is recommended to play the game in Fullscreen mode.

To reset the highscore: Press space + right mouse button

Developed by: Johann Mocke
